basics.name: Vishwas Hegde
basics.label: Student at WPI, Intern at Rapiscan Systems
basics.summary: A Robotics and Machine Learning enthusiast with a strong foundation in motion planning, navigation, and perception.

work.name: Rapiscan Systems
work.position: Intern Computer Vision and Deep Learning
work.summary: Implemented Residual Attention based U-Net for X-ray image denoising. Created an efficient pipeline on Azure ML and fine-tuned the model to achieve a PSNR close to 28 dB. Explored Diffusion models for image super-resolution to enhance image quality with cutting edge Generative AI approach.

work.name: ELPIS LAB
work.summary: Developed adaptive motion planning algorithms for robotic arms using deep learning, with real-time parameter tuning based on point cloud analysis. Formulated a novel planner in OMPL to optimize path planning for dynamic environments.

work.name: Saint Gobain India Pvt Ltd
work.summary: Designed and implemented Industrial IoT (IIoT) systems on Ignition SCADA for data acquisition and PLC/machine integration. Enhanced workflow efficiency for over 40 production line operators and reduced material wastage by 30% with an alert system for hoppers.

highlights: First Rank in the Mechanical Engineering Department, 2021
Endowment Award for highest GPA in senior year

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
